primevc.gui.styling.StyleState

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable

Constructor

new(elementStyle : UIElementStyle, ?current : Int)

Instance Variables

current(default,setCurrent) : Int

elementStyle(default,null) : UIElementStyle

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

removeStyles() : Int

returns
all the changes in the UIElementStyle that are caused by removing the styles
Method will loop over every style of the current states and will remove them from the UIElementStyle object.

setStyles() : Int

returns
all the changes in the UIElementStyle that are caused by adding the styles
Method will look in all the available state-lists to find every styledefinition for the requested state. If a style-definition is found, it will be added to the parent.
